item.title: *EASY* Npc Spawning on 667/704
item.dc:creator: @MyRsPs MyRsPs
item.description:
@MyRsPs wrote:

Hey,
Yes, I know there are other types of tutorials on this but I find this the easiest way of Spawning NPC’s on the Matrix Source.

First go into your Source Folder then: src/com/rs/utils/NPCSpawning.Java

Scroll down until you see:

public static void spawnNPCS() { /** * NPCS */; World.spawnNPC(564, new WorldTile(3597, 3368, 0), -1, false, true); World.spawnNPC(550, new WorldTile(3592, 3368, 0), -1, false, true); World.spawnNPC(546, new WorldTile(3590, 3365, 0), -1, false, true); World.spawnNPC(549, new WorldTile(3593, 3363, 0), -1, false, true); World.spawnNPC(683, new WorldTile(3597, 3363, 0), -1, false, true);

Here is what that means:

So in this section I will show you how to add a specific NPC in a specific place. The place we will use is the “Grand Exchange Fountain” and the NPC we will use is Hans:

Then all you have to do is copy a line of the code above and type in what you need and Save/Close/Compile.

Hope I helped.

  • Chris.

Read full topic
